content:
@Alam Hallan just presented a really interesting session at Canada's "FHIR North" conference about a technology that allows patients to manage their own patient record and to collect information from and expose information to the various participants in their care team. I talked him into signing up here on chat.fhir.org so I could connect him with this work group. I suspect most of this group would find it interesting if we can get him to present for 15 or 20 minutes on one of our upcoming conference calls.

Everyone, meet Alam. Alam, meet the Patient Empowerment work group :smile:
@Alam Hallan hello - what is this technology???

@Dave deBronkart Hi Dave. Am building a patient controlled health records that gives permission to various healthcare providers to write to instead of the traditional approach of being owned by the providers.
That's certainly what we're all here for - welcome!
